alert.note: Alert for Clay; Fillmore; Hamilton; Nuckolls; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 18 at 9:10PM CDT until April 18 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Clay County in south central Nebraska... Northeastern Nuckolls County in south central Nebraska... Southwestern York County in east central Nebraska... Southeastern Hamilton County in south central Nebraska... Fillmore County in south central Nebraska... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 910 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Inland to near Fairfield to near Edgar, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Harvard and Clay Center around 915 PM CDT. Ong, Saronville and Stockham around 930 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Sutton, Shickley, Henderson, Hampton, Grafton, Geneva, Lushton, Bradshaw, Fairmont and McCool Junction. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 335 and 350. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
